dcterms:creator: M. Abadi
A. Chu
I. Goodfellow
H.B. McMahan
I. Mironov
K. Talwar
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 training and 10,000 testing gray-scale images of handwritten digits, used for training and evaluating machine learning models.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: N. Mu
J. Gilmer
dcterms:description: A corrupted version of the MNIST dataset, known as MNIST-C, which serves as a robustness benchmark for computer vision models, containing 31 different common corruptions applied to the standard MNIST.
dcterms:title: MNIST-C

dcterms:creator: M. Abadi
A. Chu
I. Goodfellow
H.B. McMahan
I. Mironov
K. Talwar
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 training and 10,000 testing color images in 10 classes, used for training and evaluating machine learning models.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: K. Jarrett
K. Kavukcuoglu
M. Ranzato
Y. LeCun
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 training and 40,000 testing color images in 100 classes, used for training and evaluating machine learning models.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100
